user_input: Please create hourly Electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Decompose annual electricity demand figures into hourly profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios and for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the appropriate demand profile entities for processing.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the generated hourly demand profiles.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, identify the nodes that require splitting.

tasks.description: Convert and export the hourly demand profiles to the TST format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the conversion parameters to generate TST output files.
